```
P,Q,R ::= ⊤              (* true *)
        | ⊥              (* false *)
        | A, B, C        (* propositional symbols *)
        | ¬P             (* sugar for P⇒⊥ *)
        | P ∧ Q          (* "P and Q" (conjunction) *)
        | P ∨ Q          (* "P or Q" (disjunction) *)
        | P ⇒ Q         (* "P implies Q" (implication) *)
        | P ⇔ Q         (* "P if and only if Q" (double implication) *)

```
